segments.text: Oh , so the zoo is over there . Thank you so much for your help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . Can I ask you what brings you to China ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m actually travelling around Asia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , very nice . How long will you be in Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . Well , I ’ ll give you my phone number and if you need a guide , please call me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . That ’ s very kind .
segments.speaker: S1
